document_data.name: Toren
document_data.History:
Toren was a brutal half-orc fighter in command of part of the Zhent army in [[Dagger Falls]]. During the kidnapping of [[Randal Morn]], he had many skirmished with the adventures recruited to free the dale's rightful heir.
 
At last, in the final battle against the resistance fighters, Toren and some of his men refused to accept defeat and retreated into a tavern., There they fought to the last man against Morn's forces.
